examples.example: 我们投入了大量的时间和精力来完成这个项目，并且取得了非常好的成果。

translate.english: We have invested a lot of time and energy to complete this project and have achieved very good results.

examples.example: 他花费了大量的心血在自己的艺术创作上，终于收获了满满的赞誉。

translate.english: He spent a lot of effort on his artistic creation and finally reaped full praise.

examples.example: 他阅读了大量的书籍，知识储备变得十分丰富。

translate.english: He read a large number of books and his knowledge reserve became very rich.
